column1: #Text=Five years after it began , the Iraq War is still raging with no end in sight .
#Text=As president , how would you handle it ?
#Text=We would be out in 3-4 months of my taking office .
#Text=With 32 years in the military , I know how to do it in an orderly and professional way .
#Text=Within ten days of my being confirmed of being the next president , I will let those planners in the Pentagon know what I expect and to plan for it .
#Text=Bush will keep the war going until the day he is out of the office .
#Text=When I take office , I expect to have a plan on my desk to pull out of both Iraq and Afghanistan within 24 hours .
#Text=No plan on my desk within 24 hours , I will start firing a lot of generals .
#Text=I am not only a graduate of the US Army Command & General Staff College , but taught it for nearly six years .
#Text=How would you help the struggling working class man , woman or family ?
#Text=Put an end to free and very unfair trade , especially NAFTA ; Republicans and Democrats working together gave us free , unfair trade and NAFTA .
#Text=It will take Mad Max and the Constitution Party to end it .
#Text=For many Americans , health care is a major issue .
#Text=Socialized medicine is the wrong way ; look at England and Canada .
#Text=I will have my people study the French system .
#Text=It works for both their doctors and insurance companies .
#Text=We can do it in this country .
#Text=How would you handle America 's education system ?
#Text=The states know best how to educate their children .
#Text=Illegal immigration is a major problem in America .
#Text=I will send all 20 to 30 million home .
#Text=End birth right babies ; no social security for them , etc.
#Text=They are here illegally ; now what part of that does anyone not understand ?
#Text=There are filling up our jails , prisons , stressing out our schools and hospitals .
#Text=I will see to that they are ALL removed ASAP .
#Text=To be sure many of them are good people , but they are illegal .
#Text=They are also stressing out our environment .
#Text=Abortion is a controversial subject amongst Americans .
#Text=Millions of abortions have taken place since the federal government has gotten involved .
#Text=I trust the states to do the right thing .
#Text=Michigan is a leader in saving the unborn ; and would do more if not for the federal government .
